        Specified by:

      • addCity

        public boolean addCity(City city)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Add new city to the database. The id value in the City object will not be taken into account and the database will establish one. It can happen that there are duplicate values (e.g. cities with the same name)
        Specified by:
        addCity in interface Model
        Parameters:
        city - City to be inserted
        Returns:
        true if the insertion was successful, false otherwise
